description: Recommend appropriate consulting frameworks based on challenge type and context
Guide consulting engagement through discovery, assessment, recommendations, and roadmap phases
Apply strategic frameworks such as SWOT, Porter's Five Forces, PESTEL to analyze business situations
Apply prioritization methods including RICE, weighted matrix, MoSCoW, and effort-impact analysis
Assess organizational change readiness using Kotter, ADKAR, Lewin, and Bridges models
Map and analyze stakeholders using power-interest grid, influence-impact matrix, and RACI
Create adoption and rollout plans including training, change network, and sustainment strategies
Calculate Net Present Value for investment analysis with discount rate sensitivity
Calculate Internal Rate of Return and Modified IRR for investment comparison
Calculate Total Cost of Ownership across lifecycle phases including hidden and opportunity costs
Run Monte Carlo simulations for risk analysis with configurable distributions and iterations
Perform sensitivity analysis using tornado and spider diagrams for key variable identification
Calculate simple and discounted payback periods with break-even analysis
Generate consulting business case documents with executive summary, financials, and recommendations
Generate implementation roadmap documents with phases, milestones, dependencies, and governance
